description: Try our easy to follow Strawberry & Mint Ice-Cream Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Strawberry & Mint Ice-Cream Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup caster sugar; plus 1/4 cup caster sugar; 2 tbs caster sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Brown meringue spikes with a kitchen blowtorch, if you don't have a blowtorch place it in the oven and watch to make sure it doesn't burn. Serve.
